paragraph.paragraph: The tool has a small toolbar for you to use, consisting of only five buttons.

New Project: Creates a new project, discarding any current information. If you currently have a new or previously opened project you will be asked if you want to discard any unsaved project information.
Open Project: Opens a previously save project. If you currently have a new or previously opened project you will be asked if you want to discard any unsaved project information.

Save Project: Saves the current project to disk. If the project has not been saved already you will be asked for a location and file name to save the project to. For opened projects or projects that have already been saved once, clicking the save toolbar button will update the existing project file on disk with the recent changes.

Check Assembly: Checks the specified assembly for Eiffel/CLS-Compliance. Clicking check will automatically take you to the Compliance Checker tab where, given that you have specified a valid assembly, a report will be built.
